idea: BHIMASHANKAR FUELS PRIVATE LIMITED is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel for your generator (DG sets) / cars/fleet vehicles etc. in a safe, reliable, and efficient way. We are making refueling smarter when everything in the world is available online, we are coming with providing online home delivery of fuel.

idea:
Every area have its own recognisation because of some famous street food available there . In India small food stalls not listed on any delivery app .

and their is also great rush on such stalls because of their own original taste.

this app can provide home delivery  and also show the status of pending order online itself which will also save time of the customer and their will less public gathering near such stalls . and this will also boost the business of such small shops . In this app public review will also be notted down in order to make the outsider know about the best street food available in that area .

idea:
Furation Technology is information technology or simply a tech-savvy company created in Mumbai, Maharashtra., India.

A well-versed company that aims to technically upgrade the citizens with modernity and feasibility.

It is one of the first and finest product-based IT companies in India. It has come up with precise users requirement and enormous innovation.

It offers a global social networking platform namely Flyer for bringing together all the like-minded people around the globe.

Furation Technology carries a great embedded vision to bring drastic transformation in the technology sector around the globe.

Furation Technology is coming up with many more applications in the near future which will solve modern problems of society and

create new opportunities.
